comparative_superlative_test_data.description: 比較級・最上級テストデータ - 形容詞・副詞各3例文ずつ（計12例文）

comparative_adjective_1.sentence: This book is bigger than that one.
comparative_adjective_1.explanation: 形容詞比較級: bigger (-er語尾) + than句をM2配置

comparative_adjective_2.sentence: Today is more interesting than yesterday.
comparative_adjective_2.explanation: 形容詞比較級: more + 形容詞 + than句をM2配置

comparative_adjective_3.sentence: She looks more beautiful than her sister.
comparative_adjective_3.explanation: 形容詞比較級: more + 形容詞 + than句をM2配置

superlative_adjective_1.sentence: She is the smartest of all the students.
superlative_adjective_1.explanation: 形容詞最上級: the + -est語尾 + of句をM2配置

superlative_adjective_2.sentence: This is the most beautiful flower in the garden.
superlative_adjective_2.explanation: 形容詞最上級: the most + 形容詞 + 場所句をM2配置

superlative_adjective_3.sentence: Mount Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
superlative_adjective_3.explanation: 形容詞最上級: the + -est語尾 + 名詞 + 場所句をM2配置

comparative_adverb_1.sentence: He runs faster than anyone else.
comparative_adverb_1.explanation: 副詞比較級: faster (-er語尾) をM2、than句をM3配置

comparative_adverb_2.sentence: She speaks more clearly than before.
comparative_adverb_2.explanation: 副詞比較級: more + 副詞をM2、than句をM3配置

comparative_adverb_3.sentence: The train arrives more frequently than the bus.
comparative_adverb_3.explanation: 副詞比較級: more + 副詞をM2、than句をM3配置

superlative_adverb_1.sentence: She studies hardest of all students.
superlative_adverb_1.explanation: 副詞最上級: -est語尾をM2、of句をM3配置

superlative_adverb_2.sentence: He works most efficiently in the morning.
superlative_adverb_2.explanation: 副詞最上級: most + 副詞をM2、場所・時間句をM3配置

superlative_adverb_3.sentence: This machine operates most smoothly among all models.
superlative_adverb_3.explanation: 副詞最上級: most + 副詞をM2、among句をM3配置

rephrase_slot_rules.comparative_adjective: C1スロット（補語）+ M2スロット（than句）
rephrase_slot_rules.superlative_adjective: C1スロット（補語）+ M2スロット（of句・場所句）
rephrase_slot_rules.comparative_adverb: M2スロット（副詞）+ M3スロット（than句）
rephrase_slot_rules.superlative_adverb: M2スロット（副詞）+ M3スロット（of句・場所句）
